reviewText: If you like the following models - Danni Ashe, Bobby Eden, Veronica Zemanova, Julia Hayes, Juliet Cariaga, and Becky Sunshine - then you'll enjoy this DVD which features each of them stripping one at a time in segments lasting several minutes. And if you don't like these bodacious ladies, check your pulse to make sure you're still alive! All of them are very natural in front of the camera, while the photography and picture quality are very good too. One quibble is the fake backgrounds in some segments, which at times I find a little off-putting. For instance, Veronica Zemanova is supposed to be in Hell, so while she's taking off her devil outfit there's a background of flames that's distractingly unreal. Actually, my favorite part of the DVD is the interviews that Danni has with several of the ladies, and in each interview both are mostly or totally in the buff. And there's a really hot bonus interview running about 10 minutes that Danni does with Julia Hayes, with the two of them starting out fully clothed, and ending up totally au natural. mmmmmmm......I think I'm in love with both of them! All in all, this is a very nicely-done and hot DVD, though if like me you prefer a DVD with more variety of set-ups, try Danni's Wet Adventures. That's my favorite of hers that I've seen so far.
